verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Should not the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H6030>answered?<s%> and should a <S%H376>man<s%> full of <S%H8193>talk<s%> be <S%H6663>justified?<s%>
Should your <S%H907>lies<s%> make <S%H4962>men<s%> <S%H2790>hold<s%> their <S%H2790>peace?<s%> and when you <S%H3932>mock,<s%> shall <S%H369>no<s%> man make you <S%H3637>ashamed?<s%>
For you have <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H3948>doctrine<s%> is <S%H2134>pure,<s%> and I am <S%H1249>clean<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
But oh that <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H6605>open<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> you;

And that he would <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> that they are <S%H3718>double<s%> to that which is! <S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore that <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H5382>exacts<s%> of you less than your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> deserves.
Can you by <S%H2714>searching<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> out <S%H433>God?<s%> can you <S%H4672>find<s%> out the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> to <S%H8503>perfection?<s%>
It is as <S%H1363>high<s%> as <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can you <S%H6466>do?<s%> <S%H6013>deeper<s%> than <S%H7585>hell;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> can you <S%H3045>know?<s%>
The <S%H4055>measure<s%> thereof is <S%H752>longer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7342>broader<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> he <S%H2498>cut<s%> off, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> up, or <S%H6950>gather<s%> together, then <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7725>hinder<s%> him?
For he <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4962>men:<s%> he <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H205>wickedness<s%> also; will he not then <S%H995>consider<s%> it?
For <S%H5014>vain<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> would be <S%H3823>wise,<s%> though <S%H120>man<s%> be <S%H3205>born<s%> like a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>ass's<s%> <S%H168>colt.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H3559>prepare<s%> your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H6566>stretch<s%> out your <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> him;
<S%H518>If<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> be in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> put it <S%H7350>far<s%> away, and let not <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in your <S%H168>tabernacles.<s%>
For <S%H227>then<s%> shall you <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H6440>face<s%> without <S%H3971>spot;<s%> yes, you shall be <S%H3332>steadfast,<s%> and shall not <S%H3372>fear:<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> you shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H5999>misery,<s%> and <S%H2142>remember<s%> it as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that <S%H5674>pass<s%> away:
And your <S%H2465>age<s%> shall be <S%H6965>clearer<s%> than the <S%H6672>noonday:<s%> you shall <S%H5774>shine<s%> forth, you shall be as the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

And you shall be <S%H982>secure,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there is <S%H8615>hope;<s%> yes, you shall <S%H2658>dig<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> you, and you shall <S%H7901>take<s%> your <S%H7901>rest<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
Also you shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make you <S%H2729>afraid;<s%> yes, <S%H7227>many<s%> shall make <S%H2470>suit<s%> to you.

But the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail,<s%> and they shall not <S%H4498>escape,<s%> <S%H6><s%> and their <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall be as the <S%H4646>giving<s%> up of the <S%H5315>ghost.<s%>
